findings.title: Forwarder suffixData
findings.description: Consider modifying the interface so that suffixData is accepted in a hash form.

findings.title: IStakeManager unstakeDelay and withdrawBlock optimization
findings.description: Optimization opportunity to pack unstakeDelay and withdrawBlock into the same slot as the owner in order to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: Unused Function readAddress
findings.description: The function `readAddress` is not used and can be considered obsolete.

findings.title: BasePaymaster ERC20 token withdrawal
findings.description: Consider adding a function to withdraw ERC20 tokens from the paymaster, in case they end up locked.

findings.title: RelayHub gas usage optimization
findings.description: Optimization, `balances[account]` read twice in this function. Consider putting it into a local variable to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: RelayHub underflow possibility
findings.description: Subtraction could cause an underflow though it is safe because it will revert further down in `calculateCharge` and the worker can be subsequently penalized.

findings.title: RelayHub stakeInfo pulling
findings.description: The `stakeInfo` is excessively pulled from the `StakeManager` and then immediately passed back to it.

findings.title: StakeManager excessive storage reads
findings.description: Optimization, there are 3 excessive storage reads here, consider using local variables instead to optimize gas usage.

findings.title: StakeManager ether burning
findings.description: Burning ether could be wasteful. Consider directing it to

findings.title: RelayHub workerToManager clearing
findings.description: workerToManager could not be cleared once assigned.

findings.title: RelayHub workerCount increase limitation
findings.description: workerCount could not increase above the maxWorkerCount

findings.title: RelayHub penalize caller restriction
findings.description: The `penalize` function can only be called by `penalizer` in RelayHub.

findings.title: RelayHub Paymaster balance decrease
findings.description: Paymaster's balance could not be decreased without the legitimate relay request.

findings.title: StakeManager relay manager and owner address equality
findings.description: Relay manager and its owner cannot have the same address.

findings.title: StakeManager stakes sum limitation
findings.description: Sum of the `stakes` is always less than or equal to the StakeManager contract's balance.

findings.title: StakeManager stake decrease restriction
findings.description: Stake could not be decreased without a call from RelayHub or the stake owner.

findings.title: StakeManager unstakeDelay decrease restriction
findings.description: unstakeDelay could not be decreased without a withdrawal.
